Â 
Given a string, identify the numbers and add those numbers and display the result
Â 

Input
The first line contains a single integer T <= 40, the number of test cases. T test cases follow. The only line of each test case contains a non-empty text composed only of letters of English alphabet and integers along with the aplhabets. The length of the text is less then 100. There are no spaces in the input..

Output
For each test case, output a single line containing the sum of all identified numbers corresponding to the input line.


Example
Input:
3
cc3ffhg76ygj88kh
aPlmFlnnb7hjh8hkh
XcCnLb0kjku0jkj

Output:
167
15
0
